lender.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a person or organization that lends money to people on condition that they pay it back
lender.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Several lenders are offering very attractive rates of interest at the moment.
lender.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a person or organization that lends people money on the condition that they pay it back
lender.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Newspaper ads can be helpful in finding the lender with the most favorable interest rates.
